trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En utløser handling som gir funksjonaliteten for søking (hopper over) til et angitt klokkeslett i den aktive perioden for en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a SeekStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en SeekStoryboard handling med <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>eller en <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>søke etter en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at søk trer ikke i dreieboken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>Innstillinger hensyn: dreieboken behandles som om den har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 og ingen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pause, Fortsett, Stopp eller ellers kontrollen en dreieboken interaktivt til kunne stanse midlertidig, gjenoppta eller ellers kontrollere en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interaktivt angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>og bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objektet (som <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) til å kontrollere ved å referere til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>kan ikke kontrolleres interaktivt når den er startet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [slik: Bruk hendelsesutløsere til å kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor som dreieboken kan flytte fremover eller bakover fra Søk origo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: En positiv eller negativ verdi som angir hvor som dreieboken kan flytte fremover eller bakover fra Søk origo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir posisjonen fra som dette prøve operasjonen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.

Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> skal serialiseres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** hvis den <> </> *> for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> skal serialiserte; ellers, * *false**.
